name: StarTruck VR
description:
Startruck is a VR game centered around working in a kitchen on a space station. The game however comes with a twist, Gravity is disabled, even for the player. Enjoy floating around the level, or play with traditional locomotion.

Startruck is made using Unreal Engine, and made as a final student project by a team of 5 memebers (2 programmers, 3 artists)

This game works best on an Oculus Rift (S) headset, Other headsets will work, though all features may not work as intended (This has not been tested)

If you encounter any bugs in the game. please feel free to fill out the form below.

Some bugs we are aware about and are in the process of being fixed.

Controls

A - Enable/Disable the players gravity (Toggle)

B/Y - Hand Boosters (in Zero Gravity mode)

Side Grab Button - Grab

Trigger- Index Finger

The index finger is required to activate UI buttons.

Bug Report Form

https://forms.gle/LLzfn2JkDEKp3fWm6

Team Members

Chloe Johnston - Programmer (AI, Interactables, UI) 

Cody Bartlett - Programmer (Hands, Cooking Mechanics, interactables)

Ryan Bocking - Lead Artist, Environments (Interior/Exterior), Technical Artist, Texture Artist.

Deena Sanguanrachasab - 2D artist, Prop Artist, Exterior Prop Artist

Sriram Jegadeesan - Character Artist, Prop Artist, Texture Artist (Props)
